The Toggles

Checkbox
Checkbox {{checkbox1}} 
  
    Checkbox
  
  {x{checkbox1}}
  ]]>
Checkbox {{checkbox2}} 
  
    Checkbox
  
  {x{checkbox2}}
    ]]>

The mdl-checkbox is ngModel compliant. You can provide the mdl-ripple directive to create a ripple effect.

Radios
Value 1 Value 2 {{radioOption}} 
  Value 1
  Value 2

  {x{radioOption}}
  ]]>

The mdl-radio component is ngModel compliant. The name attribute is used to group radios together. The value is used to set the ngModel value if the option is selected. You can provide the mdl-ripple directive to create a ripple effect.

Icon Toggle
format_bold {{checkbox1}} format_italic {{checkbox2}} 
  format_bold
  {x{checkbox1}}
  format_italic
  {x{checkbox2}}
  ]]>

The mdl-icon-toggle is much like a mdl-checkbox componnet. The only difference: an colored icon is used to cover the state of the checkbox.

Switch
Option 1 {{checkbox1}} Option 2 {{checkbox2}} 
  Option 1
  {x{checkbox1}}
  Option 2
  {x{checkbox2}}
  ]]>

The mdl-switch is much like an mdl-checkbox componnet. The only difference: an toggle ui is used to cover the state of the checkbox.
